examples.title: Dev Portal with API Keys
examples.description: An example of a Zuplo Dev Portal with support for self-serve API key creation.

examples.title: Remote MCP Server
examples.description: Create a remote MCP server for an API with authentication and additional security policies.

examples.title: Metering with OpenMeter
examples.description: Meter requests, enforce plan limits and monetize your API by integrating Zuplo with OpenMeter.

examples.title: API Linting
examples.description: See how to use API linting to enforce api consistency and require Zuplo features like policies.

examples.title: Backend for Frontend (BFF) Auth
examples.description: Optimize UX and security in web applications with this approach.

examples.title: Custom Rate Limiting
examples.description: Invoke the Rate Limit policy programatically and then modify the 429 response.

examples.title: Custom Modules
examples.description: How to bundle custom node modules to use in your Zuplo project.

examples.title: Dynamic Rate Limits
examples.description: See how to create dynamic rate limits with the Rick & Morty API sample.

examples.title: Log Request & Response
examples.description: Capture the full request and response to send to your log provider.

examples.title: Route Custom Data
examples.description: Use custom data from OpenAPI documents in policies and handlers.

examples.title: Rewrite Request Body
examples.description: Use a custom policy to rewrite the body of a Request

examples.title: Custom Base Path
examples.description: Use custom properties in OpenAPI documents to remove a base path and set the forwarding server.

examples.title: OpenFGA Authorization
examples.description: Use OpenFGA from a custom policy to authorize access to a resource.

examples.title: Mocking & Unit Test
examples.description: Create unit tests by mocking Zuplo objects.

examples.title: Schema Validation with File Refs
examples.description: Use the Request Validation policy with OpenAPI that references external files.
